item.title: Pisco sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml pisco
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1/2 egg white
  • (garnish) aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with drops of bitters and a lime slice.

item.title: Whiskey sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml bourbon
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes orange bitters
  • 1/2 egg white (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish.
